member.name: M:GroupAssignmentTeamBlue.API.Controllers.CommentController.GetComment(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: GET Method for getting comments based on the realEstate they were written for, with skip and take for paging-functionality
member.param: id-number to the realEstate in question
Optional number for comments to skip, default is 0
optional number for comments to take, default is 10, max is 100

member.name: M:GroupAssignmentTeamBlue.API.Controllers.CommentController.GetComment(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets comments made by a given user, by username
member.param: The user from where to get comments
The amount of comments to skip, default = 0
The amount of comments to take, default = 10
member.returns: 200 OK, with a list of comments

member.name: M:GroupAssignmentTeamBlue.API.Controllers.CommentController.PostComment(GroupAssignmentTeamBlue.API.Models.DtoModels.ForCreation.CommentForCreationDto)
member.summary: POST for a new comment
member.param: Information about the comment to be created
member.returns: 200 OK with comment content, username and creation-time. BadRequest if RealEstate is not found

member.name: M:GroupAssignmentTeamBlue.API.Controllers.RealEstateController.GetRealEstates(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: GET for RealEstates, with optional skip/take parameters for paging, does not require authentication
member.param: Amount to skip, can't be negative number. default = 0
Amount to take, has to be 1-100. default = 10
member.returns: A list of RealEstates present, BadRequest if skip/take is invalid numbers

member.name: M:GroupAssignmentTeamBlue.API.Controllers.RealEstateController.GetRealEstate(System.Int32)
member.summary: GET for a single RealEstate, by RealEstateId. If user is authenticated, it returns full details, else a dto with less details
member.param: Id of the RealEstate to get
member.returns: a RealEstate, with details corresponding to if the user is logged in or not

member.summary: POST action for RealEstate. Creates a new RealEstate. Requires authentication
member.param: Contains all the information needed to create a new RealEstate
member.returns: 201 Created, with some of the info input

member.name: M:GroupAssignmentTeamBlue.API.Controllers.UserController.GetUser(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a user with the given username from the repository.

member.summary: Creates a rating if no record with corelating rating- and rated-user was found, else it updates the existing record.
member.returns: Returns a status code of 200 OK if the records was updated or created. If no user with the given id was found a status code of 404 Not Found is returned.
